name: Taiyuan Nanling Coal Mine
company_mentions: Shanxi Yangmei Group Nanling Coal Industry Co Ltd

verification.notes: Canonical name+slug generated. Web search geocoded. Source: https://www.gem.wiki/%E5%B1%B1%E8%A5%BF%E9%98%B3%E7%85%A4%E9%9B%86%E5%9B%A2%E5%8D%97%E5%B2%AD%E7%85%A4%E4%B8%9A%E6%9C%89%E9%99%90%E5%85%AC%E5%8F%B8. Taiyuan Nanling Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in the Xiaodian District of Taiyuan, Shanxi Province, with a production capacity of 900,000 tons per year

operators: Shanxi Yangmei Group Nanling Coal Industry Co Ltd
owners: Yangmei Group Tianyu Mining Investment Co Ltd
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Shanxi Yangmei Group Nanling Coal Industry, which is a subsidiary of Yangmei Group Tianyu Mining Investment Co Ltd.
